directions: Combine sour cream, mayonnaise, chipped beef, parsley, onion, seasoned salt, and dill in a bowl until dip is well mixed; chill in refrigerator for 24 hours.
Cut the top off the rye bread and scoop out the bread, breaking into bite-size pieces. Fill bread "boat" with dip. Place bread "boat" on a serving tray and arrange the bread pieces around it.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons seasoned salt (such as Spice Islands® Beau Monde Seasoning)
title: Rye Bread Boat Dip
